channel.title: My first ever Trailer is finished!
channel.description:
Here it is. Remember that I made it solely on Windows Movie Maker, and that I have never made a video before.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d80zKt8q3y8&feature=channel_page[/url]
Comments, criticisms, and everything. Just say something so I know people have seen it.
Someone please post something!

item.title: My first ever Trailer is finished!
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Transitions and such are nice, better then most windows movie maker videos I’ve seen. The real art to machinima/video game films is a lot less in the editing aspect, and a lot more in the actual filming. Once BM comes out, instead of splicing together video segments, go film some gameplay and stuff, because that’s where the artistic talent is needed the most.

Why directors get paid the big bucks.

Read full topic
item.source: My first ever Trailer is finished!

item.title: My first ever Trailer is finished!

item.description:
samzala:

Lol, you can see a fighter flying backwards at 0:09
Overall, quite nice for a first.

Oh my god THESE SHROOMS ARE AWWWWWWESOOOOMEEE!!! :retard:

item.title: My first ever Trailer is finished!
item.dc:creator: The_Assassin47
item.description:
The music is ‘New Mexico’ by Edward Shearmur, from the movie KPAX.
That’s in the movie description BTW.

Would you guys help me out and tell me what is good and bad, and how to imporve?
